alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Isle of Wight; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight , the southwestern City of Chesapeake and the southern City of Suffolk through 915 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrsville, or near Holland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Holland around 840 PM EDT. Downtown Suffolk around 850 PM EDT. Whaleyville around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Collosse, Lummis, Nurney, Kilby, Suffolk Airport, Walters, Boaz, Burdette, Saunders and Elwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
